item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Replace the code i gave you with this then -.-

[code]} if (command.startsWith(“object”)
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username”)) {

            try {
                int object = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
                int orient = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13, 14));
                int type = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(15));

                AddGlobalObj(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
                // createNewTileObject(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sM("Bad object ID"); [/code]

Try that…idk if it’ll help or not

Read full topic

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:2, topic:336740”]if you have a [317]

[code]} if (command.startsWith(“object”)
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username”)) {

            try {
                int object = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
                int orient = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13, 14));
                int type = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(15));

                AddGlobalObj(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
                // createNewTileObject(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Bad object ID");

}[/code][/quote]

Uh just note that you may get some errors, i.e sendMessage is sM on some sources, there usually very similiar.

Read full topic
